author: andrius-k
body:
#### PR description:

This backport is to make sure that the updated DQM bin by bin comparison tool could be used for PRs opened against 10_6 release as well. 

#### PR validation:

The functionality was validated locally. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Backport of #26737 and #26848
title: Dqm binbybin fix
